house_listing.house_description: This 2 level single family home built in 1992 has 4 bedroom(s), 3 bath(s) and approximately 3846 square feet of living area. Rooms include den, family room, master bedroom. Features include view, fireplace, air conditioning.

residential_listing_-_feature_details.fireplace: Family Room, Living Room, Master Bedroom
residential_listing_-_feature_details.view: Canyon View, City Lights View, Mountain View
